trans-unit.source: Defines a wrapper object to access the cryptographic service provider (CSP) implementation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Definerer et wrapper-objekt for å få tilgang til den kryptografiske leverandør (CSP) implementeringen av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"> </xref> algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: You can use the DSACryptoServiceProvider class to create digital signatures and protect the integrity of your data.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke klassen DSACryptoServiceProvider til å opprette signaturer og beskytte dataene dine.

trans-unit.source: To use a public-key system to digitally sign a message, the sender first applies a hash function to the message to create a message digest.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke en fellesnøkkel systemet til å signere en melding, gjelder avsenderen først en hash-funksjonen meldingen for å lage et meldingssammendrag.

trans-unit.source: The sender then encrypts the message digest with the sender's private key to create the sender's personal signature.
trans-unit.target: Avsenderen krypterer deretter meldingsgodkjenningen med avsenderens private nøkkelen til å opprette avsenderens personlig signatur.

trans-unit.source: Upon receiving the message and signature, the receiver decrypts the signature using the sender's public key to recover the message digest and hashes the message using the same hash algorithm that the sender used.
trans-unit.target: Etter at du mottar meldingen og signaturen, mottakeren dekrypterer signaturen ved bruk av fellesnøkkel for avsenderens gjenopprette meldingsgodkjenningen og hashes meldingen med den samme hash-algoritmen som brukes av avsenderen.

trans-unit.source: If the message digest that the receiver computes exactly matches the message digest received from the sender, the receiver can be sure that the message was not altered while in transit.
trans-unit.target: Hvis meldingsgodkjenningen mottakeren beregner nøyaktig samsvar meldingsgodkjenningen mottatt fra avsenderen, kan mottakeren være sikker på at meldingen ikke ble endret mens du er i transitt.

trans-unit.source: Note that a signature can be verified by anyone, because the sender's public key is common knowledge.
trans-unit.target: Vær oppmerksom på at en signatur kan kontrolleres av alle, fordi avsenderens fellesnøkkelen er felles kunnskap.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Newer asymmetric algorithms are available.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Nyere asymmetriske algoritmer er tilgjengelige.

trans-unit.source: Consider using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> class instead of the DSACryptoServiceProvider class.
trans-unit.target: Vurder å bruke <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>klassen i stedet for DSACryptoServiceProvider klasse.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: Use DSACryptoServiceProvider only for compatibility with legacy applications and data.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DSACryptoServiceProvider bare for kompatibilitet med eldre programmer og data.

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports key lengths from 512 bits to 1024 bits in increments of 64 bits.
trans-unit.target: Denne algoritmen støtter nøkler fra 512 biter til 1024 biter i intervaller på 64-biters.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider"></xref> class with the specified key size.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider"> </xref> klassen med den angitte nøkkelstørrelsen.

trans-unit.source: The size of the key for the asymmetric algorithm in bits.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på nøkkel for den asymmetriske algoritmen i biter.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider"></xref> class with the specified parameters for the cryptographic service provider (CSP).
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider"> </xref> klassen med de angitte parameterne for kryptografitjenesteleverandøren (CSP).

trans-unit.source: The parameters for the CSP.
trans-unit.target: Parameterne for CSP i.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider"></xref> class with the specified key size and parameters for the cryptographic service provider (CSP).
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider"> </xref> klassen med den angitte nøkkelstørrelsen og parametere for kryptografitjenesteleverandøren (CSP).

trans-unit.source: The size of the key for the cryptographic algorithm in bits.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på nøkkelen for kryptografisk algoritmen i biter.

trans-unit.source: The parameters for the CSP.
trans-unit.target: Parameterne for CSP i.

trans-unit.source: The CSP cannot be acquired.
trans-unit.target: Være kan ikke anskaffet CSP i.

trans-unit.source: -or- The key cannot be created.
trans-unit.target: - eller - nøkkelen kan ikke opprettes.

trans-unit.source: dwKeySize is out of range.
trans-unit.target: dwKeySizeer utenfor området.

trans-unit.source: Creates the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"> </xref> signatur for de angitte dataene.

trans-unit.source: The data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: Dataene som skal signeres.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Den digitale signaturen for de angitte dataene.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo"></xref> object that describes additional information about a cryptographic key pair.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo"> </xref> -objektet som beskriver tilleggsinformasjon om et kryptografisk nøkkelpar.

trans-unit.source: Use the CspKeyContainerInfo property to retrieve additional information about a cryptographic key pair.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CspKeyContainerInfo-egenskapen til å hente mer informasjon om et kryptografisk nøkkelpar.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo> object describes whether the key is exportable, and specifies the key container name, information about the provider, and other information.
trans-unit.target: Det returnerte <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo>objektet beskriver om nøkkelen kan eksporteres, og angir navnet på nøkkelbeholderen, informasjon om leverandøren og annen informasjon.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo>

trans-unit.source: In cases where a random key is generated, a key container will not be created until you call a method that uses the key.
trans-unit.target: I tilfeller der en tilfeldig nøkkel er generert opprettes en nøkkelbeholderen ikke før du kaller en metode som bruker nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: Some properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo> object returned by the CspKeyContainerInfo property will throw a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> if a key container has not been created.
trans-unit.target: Noen egenskaper for det <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo>objektet som ble returnert av egenskapen CspKeyContainerInfo vil throw en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>Hvis en nøkkelbeholderen ikke er opprettet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo>

trans-unit.source: To make sure that a key container has been created, call a method such as <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.SignData%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.SignHash%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyHash%2A>, and so on, before you call the CspKeyContainerInfo property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil forsikre deg om at en nøkkelbeholderen er opprettet, kan du kalle en metode for eksempel <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.SignData%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.SignHash%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyHash%2A>og så videre før du kaller egenskapen CspKeyContainerInfo.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyHash%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.SignHash%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.SignData%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo"></xref> object that describes additional information about a cryptographic key pair.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CspKeyContainerInfo"> </xref> -objektet som beskriver tilleggsinformasjon om et kryptografisk nøkkelpar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Exports a blob containing the key information associated with a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Eksporterer en blob som inneholder viktig informasjon knyttet til en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The ExportCspBlob method returns a blob containing key information that is compatible with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: Metoden ExportCspBlob returnerer en blob som inneholder viktig informasjon som er kompatibel med den uforvaltede Microsoft kryptografisk API (CAPI).

trans-unit.target: Importerer en blob som representerer DSA viktig informasjon.

trans-unit.source: The ImportCspBlob method initializes the key data of a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider> object using a blob that is compatible with the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI).
trans-unit.target: Metoden ImportCspBlob initialiserer viktige data for en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>objekt med en blob som er kompatibel med den uforvaltede Microsoft kryptografisk API (CAPI).</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: A byte array that represents a DSA key blob.
trans-unit.target: En bytematrise som representerer en DSA nøkkel-blob.

trans-unit.target: Importerer den angitte <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSAParameters"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Parameterne for <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Være kan ikke anskaffet kryptografitjenesteleverandør (CSP).

trans-unit.target: - eller - parameters parameteren mangler feltene.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the key exchange algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på nøkkelens utvekslingsnøkkel-algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the key exchange algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på nøkkelens utvekslingsnøkkel-algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the key used by the asymmetric algorithm in bits.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen på nøkkelen som brukes av algoritmen asymmetriske i biter.

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports key lengths from 512 bits to 1024 bits in increments of 64 bits.
trans-unit.target: Denne algoritmen støtter nøkler fra 512 biter til 1024 biter i intervaller på 64-biters.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider> class does not allow you to change key sizes using the KeySize property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>klassen tillater ikke at du kan endre nøkkel størrelser ved hjelp av KeySize-egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: Any value written to this property will fail to update the property without error.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som er skrevet til denne egenskapen kan ikke oppdatere egenskapen uten feil.

trans-unit.source: To change the key size, use one of the constructor overloads.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre nøkkelstørrelsen, Bruk overlastingene konstruktør.

trans-unit.source: The size of the key used by the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på brukes av algoritmen asymmetriske nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the key should be persisted in the cryptographic service provider (CSP).
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om nøkkelen skal beholdes i kryptografitjenesteleverandøren (CSP).

trans-unit.source: Use this property when you want to persist a key in a key container.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen når du vil beholde en nøkkel i en beholder.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key should be persisted in the CSP; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen skal beholdes i CSP; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider"></xref> object contains only a public key.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider"> </xref> objektet inneholder en fellesnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider> class can be initialized either with a public key only or with both a public and private key.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>klassen kan være initialisert enten fellesnøkkel bare eller med både offentlige og private nøkkelen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: Use the PublicOnly property to determine whether the current instance contains only a public key or both a public and private key.
trans-unit.target: Bruk PublicOnly-egenskapen til å avgjøre om den gjeldende forekomsten inneholder en fellesnøkkel eller både en offentlige og private nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider"></xref> object contains only a public key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider"> </xref> objektet inneholder bare et felles key; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the signature algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på signaturalgoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the signature algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på signaturalgoritmen.

trans-unit.source: Computes the hash value of the specified byte array and signs the resulting hash value.
trans-unit.target: Beregner hash-verdien for den angitte Bytematrisen og logger den resulterende hash-verdien.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a digital signature that is verified using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden, oppretter en digital signatur som er bekreftet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1> hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>bruker den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>nummeralgoritme.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: The input data for which to compute the hash.
trans-unit.target: Inndataene som til å beregne hash-koden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"> </xref> signatur for de angitte dataene.

trans-unit.source: Computes the hash value of the specified input stream and signs the resulting hash value.
trans-unit.target: Beregner hash-verdien for den angitte inngående dataflyten og logger den resulterende hash-verdien.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1> hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>bruker den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>nummeralgoritme.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: The input data for which to compute the hash.
trans-unit.target: Inndataene som til å beregne hash-koden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"> </xref> signatur for de angitte dataene.

trans-unit.source: Signs a byte array from the specified start point to the specified end point.
trans-unit.target: Tegn en bytematrise fra de angitte start peke til det angitte endepunktet.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a digital signature that is verified using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden, oppretter en digital signatur som er bekreftet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyData%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1> hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>bruker den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>nummeralgoritme.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: The input data to sign.
trans-unit.target: Inndataene logge.

trans-unit.source: The offset into the array from which to begin using data.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvning i matrisen som starter ved hjelp av data.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the array to use as data.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte i matrisen som brukes som data.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"> </xref> signatur for de angitte dataene.

trans-unit.source: Computes the signature for the specified hash value by encrypting it with the private key.
trans-unit.target: Beregner signaturen for den angitte hash-verdien ved å kryptere den private nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a digital signature that is verified using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyHash%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden, oppretter en digital signatur som er bekreftet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyHash%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.VerifyHash%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1> hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>bruker den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>nummeralgoritme.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: The hash value of the data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: Hash-verdien i signeres.

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm used to create the hash value of the data.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på hash-algoritmen som brukes til å opprette hash-verdien for dataene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> signature for the specified hash value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"> </xref> signaturen for den angitte hash-verdien.

trans-unit.source: The rgbHash parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rgbHash parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired.
trans-unit.target: Være kan ikke anskaffet kryptografitjenesteleverandør (CSP).

trans-unit.source: -or- There is no private key.
trans-unit.target: - eller - det finnes ingen privat nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the key should be persisted in the computer's key store instead of the user profile store.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om nøkkelen skal beholdes i datamaskinens key store i stedet for brukeren profilen butikken.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to true is equivalent to passing the UseMachineKeyStore flag to a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters> object.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen settes til true, tilsvarer Kast flagget UseMachineKeyStore til en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters>

trans-unit.source: The UseMachineKeyStore property applies to all code in the current application domain, while the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters> object applies only to classes that explicitly reference it.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen UseMachineKeyStore gjelder for alle koden i gjeldende programdomenet under <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters>objektet gjelder bare for klasser som eksplisitt referere til det.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CspParameters>

trans-unit.source: These settings are useful when impersonating or running under an account whose user profile is not loaded.
trans-unit.target: Disse innstillingene er nyttig når representerer eller kjører under en konto som har brukerprofil ikke er lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key should be persisted in the computer key store; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen skal beholdes i datamaskinen key store; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the specified signature data by comparing it to the signature computed for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer angitte signaturen dataene ved å sammenligne den signaturen beregnet for de angitte dataene.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> digital signature produced by <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.SignData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bekrefter <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>digital signatur som er generert av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.SignData%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.SignData%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1> hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>bruker den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>nummeralgoritme.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: The data that was signed.
trans-unit.target: Dataene som ble signert.

trans-unit.source: The signature data to be verified.
trans-unit.target: Datatypen signaturen bekreftes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the signature verifies as valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis signaturen bekrefter som ugyldig. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the specified signature data by comparing it to the signature computed for the specified hash value.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer angitte signaturen dataene ved å sammenligne den signaturen beregnet for den angitte hash-verdien.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> digital signature produced by <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.SignHash%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden bekrefter <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>digital signatur som er generert av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.SignHash%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider.SignHash%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>

trans-unit.source: If the `str` parameter is `null`, the default hash algorithm (SHA1) is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `str` parameteren er `null`, standard nummeralgoritmen (SHA1) brukes.

trans-unit.source: The valid hash algorithms is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldig hash-algoritmer er <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>

trans-unit.source: The hash value of the data to be signed.
trans-unit.target: Hash-verdien i signeres.

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm used to create the hash value of the data.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på hash-algoritmen som brukes til å opprette hash-verdien for dataene.

trans-unit.source: The signature data to be verified.
trans-unit.target: Datatypen signaturen bekreftes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the signature verifies as valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis signaturen bekrefter som ugyldig. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The rgbHash parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rgbHash parameter is .

trans-unit.source: -or- The rgbSignature parameter is .
trans-unit.target: -or- The rgbSignature parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired.
trans-unit.target: Være kan ikke anskaffet kryptografitjenesteleverandør (CSP).

trans-unit.source: -or- The signature cannot be verified.
trans-unit.target: - eller - signaturen bekreftes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"> </xref> signatur for de angitte dataene.

trans-unit.source: The data signed with `rgbSignature`.
trans-unit.target: Dataene som er signert med `rgbSignature`.

trans-unit.source: The signature to be verified for `rgbData`.
trans-unit.target: Signaturen bekreftes `rgbData`.

trans-unit.source: if rgbSignature matches the signature computed using the specified hash algorithm and key on rgbHash; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis rgbSignature samsvarer med signaturen beregnet ved hjelp av angitte nummeralgoritmen og nøkkelen på rgbHash ; ellers .
